mapper.select:
SELECT r.instance_id AS instanceId, d.dept_name AS dept, u.`name`, DATE_FORMAT( r.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `date`, r.content, r.amount, r.balance, r.anleihen FROM tb_reim r JOIN tb_user u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN tb_dept d ON d.id = u.dept_id WHERE r.id = #{id}
AND r.user_id = #{userId}
